an5.167:1.1: Tatra kho ayasma sariputto bhikkhu amantesi:
an5.167:1.2: “codakena, avuso, bhikkhuna param codetukamena panca dhamme ajjhattam upatthapetva paro codetabbo.
an5.167:2.7: Codakena, avuso, bhikkhuna param codetukamena ime panca dhamme ajjhattam upatthapetva paro codetabbo.
an5.167:3.1: Idhaham, avuso, ekaccam puggalam passami akalena codiyamanam no kalena kupitam, abhutena codiyamanam no bhutena kupitam, pharusena codiyamanam no sanhena kupitam, anatthasamhitena codiyamanam no atthasamhitena kupitam, dosantarena codiyamanam no mettacittena kupitam.
an5.167:4.1: Adhammacuditassa, avuso, bhikkhuno pancahakarehi avippatisaro upadahatabbo:
an5.167:4.2: ‘akalenayasma cudito no kalena, alam te avippatisaraya;
an5.167:4.3: abhutenayasma cudito no bhutena, alam te avippatisaraya;
an5.167:4.4: pharusenayasma cudito no sanhena, alam te avippatisaraya;
an5.167:4.5: anatthasamhitenayasma cudito no atthasamhitena, alam te avippatisaraya;
an5.167:4.6: dosantarenayasma cudito no mettacittena, alam te avippatisaraya’ti.
an5.167:4.7: Adhammacuditassa, avuso, bhikkhuno imehi pancahakarehi avippatisaro upadahatabbo.
an5.167:5.1: Adhammacodakassa, avuso, bhikkhuno pancahakarehi vippatisaro upadahatabbo:
an5.167:5.2: ‘akalena te, avuso, codito no kalena, alam te vippatisaraya;
an5.167:5.3: abhutena te, avuso, codito no bhutena, alam te vippatisaraya;
an5.167:5.4: pharusena te, avuso, codito no sanhena, alam te vippatisaraya;
an5.167:5.5: anatthasamhitena te, avuso, codito no atthasamhitena, alam te vippatisaraya;
an5.167:5.6: dosantarena te, avuso, codito no mettacittena, alam te vippatisaraya’ti.
an5.167:5.7: Adhammacodakassa, avuso, bhikkhuno imehi pancahakarehi vippatisaro upadahatabbo.
an5.167:5.9: Yatha na annopi bhikkhu abhutena codetabbam manneyyati.
an5.167:6.1: Idha panaham, avuso, ekaccam puggalam passami kalena codiyamanam no akalena kupitam, bhutena codiyamanam no abhutena kupitam, sanhena codiyamanam no pharusena kupitam, atthasamhitena codiyamanam no anatthasamhitena kupitam, mettacittena codiyamanam no dosantarena kupitam.
an5.167:7.1: Dhammacuditassa, avuso, bhikkhuno pancahakarehi vippatisaro upadahatabbo:
an5.167:7.2: ‘kalenayasma cudito no akalena, alam te vippatisaraya;
an5.167:7.3: bhutenayasma cudito no abhutena, alam te vippatisaraya;
an5.167:7.4: sanhenayasma cudito no pharusena, alam te vippatisaraya;
an5.167:7.5: atthasamhitenayasma cudito no anatthasamhitena, alam te vippatisaraya;
an5.167:7.6: mettacittenayasma cudito no dosantarena, alam te vippatisaraya’ti.
an5.167:7.7: Dhammacuditassa, avuso, bhikkhuno imehi pancahakarehi vippatisaro upadahatabbo.
an5.167:8.1: Dhammacodakassa, avuso, bhikkhuno pancahakarehi avippatisaro upadahatabbo:
an5.167:8.2: ‘kalena te, avuso, codito no akalena, alam te avippatisaraya;
an5.167:8.3: bhutena te, avuso, codito no abhutena, alam te avippatisaraya;
an5.167:8.4: sanhena te, avuso, codito no pharusena, alam te avippatisaraya;
an5.167:8.5: atthasamhitena te, avuso, codito no anatthasamhitena, alam te avippatisaraya;
an5.167:8.6: mettacittena te, avuso, codito no dosantarena, alam te avippatisaraya’ti.
an5.167:8.7: Dhammacodakassa, avuso, bhikkhuno imehi pancahakarehi avippatisaro upadahatabbo.
an5.167:8.9: Yatha annopi bhikkhu bhutena coditabbam manneyyati.
an5.167:9.1: Cuditena, avuso, puggalena dvisu dhammesu patitthatabbam—
an5.167:9.3: Mancepi, avuso, pare codeyyum kalena va akalena va bhutena va abhutena va sanhena va pharusena va atthasamhitena va anatthasamhitena va mettacitta va dosantara va, ahampi dvisuyeva dhammesu patitthaheyyam—
an5.167:10.1: “Evampi kho te, sariputta, vuccamana atha ca panidhekacce moghapurisa na padakkhinam ganhanti”ti.
an5.167:11.1: “Ye te, bhante, puggala assaddha jivikattha na saddha agarasma anagariyam pabbajita satha mayavino ketabino uddhata unnala capala mukhara vikinnavaca indriyesu aguttadvara bhojane amattannuno jagariyam ananuyutta samanne anapekkhavanto sikkhaya na tibbagarava bahulika sathalika okkamane pubbangama paviveke nikkhittadhura kusita hinaviriya mutthassatino asampajana asamahita vibbhantacitta duppanna elamuga, te maya evam vuccamana na padakkhinam ganhanti.
an5.167:12.1: Ye pana te, bhante, kulaputta saddha agarasma anagariyam pabbajita asatha amayavino aketabino anuddhata anunnala acapala amukhara avikinnavaca indriyesu guttadvara bhojane mattannuno jagariyam anuyutta samanne apekkhavanto sikkhaya tibbagarava na bahulika na sathalika okkamane nikkhittadhura paviveke pubbangama araddhaviriya pahitatta upatthitassatino sampajana samahita ekaggacitta pannavanto anelamuga, te maya evam vuccamana padakkhinam ganhanti”ti.
an5.167:13.1: “Ye te, sariputta, puggala assaddha jivikattha na saddha agarasma anagariyam pabbajita satha mayavino ketabino uddhata unnala capala mukhara vikinnavaca indriyesu aguttadvara bhojane amattannuno jagariyam ananuyutta samanne anapekkhavanto sikkhaya na tibbagarava bahulika sathalika okkamane pubbangama paviveke nikkhittadhura kusita hinaviriya mutthassatino asampajana asamahita vibbhantacitta duppanna elamuga, titthantu te.
an5.167:14.1: Ye pana te, sariputta, kulaputta saddha agarasma anagariyam pabbajita asatha amayavino aketabino anuddhata anunnala acapala amukhara avikinnavaca indriyesu guttadvara bhojane mattannuno jagariyam anuyutta samanne apekkhavanto sikkhaya tibbagarava na bahulika na sathalika okkamane nikkhittadhura paviveke pubbangama araddhaviriya pahitatta upatthitassatino sampajana samahita ekaggacitta pannavanto anelamuga, te tvam, sariputta, vadeyyasi.
